objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><linearGradient id='bgGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#1A1A1A;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#000000;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='accentGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#D4AF37;stop-opacity:0.3'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#D4AF37;stop-opacity:0'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bgGradient)'/><rect x='540' y='0' width='540' height='1080' fill='url(#accentGradient)'/><g opacity='0.1'><circle cx='100' cy='200' r='50' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='980' cy='900' r='70' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='250' cy='800' r='30' fill='#D4AF37'/><circle cx='400' cy='150' r='25' fill='#D4AF37'/><circle cx='800' cy='150' r='40' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='650' cy='950' r='35' fill='#D4AF37'/></g><g opacity='0.08'><line x1='40' y1='300' x2='500' y2='300' stroke='#D4AF37' stroke-width='1'/><line x1='40' y1='600' x2='500' y2='600' stroke='#D4AF37' stroke-width='1'/><line x1='40' y1='900' x2='500' y2='900' stroke='#D4AF37' stroke-width='1'/><line x1='580' y1='200' x2='1040' y2='200' stroke='#D4AF37' stroke-width='1'/><line x1='580' y1='500' x2='1040' y2='500' stroke='#D4AF37' stroke-width='1'/><line x1='580' y1='800' x2='1040' y2='800' stroke='#D4AF37' stroke-width='1'/></g></svg>

objects.text:
• Polarized UV Protection
• Premium Acetate Frame
• Iconic Ray-Ban Design

product_details.name: Classic Ray-Ban New Wayfarer - Timeless Style, Unmatched Elegance
product_details.description:
• Authentic Ray-Ban polarized sunglasses with iconic wayfarer design
• Premium black glossy acetate frame construction
• Dark tinted UV-protective lenses for maximum sun protection
• Signature Ray-Ban logo on temple and lens
• Comfortable lightweight design for all-day wear
• Durable hinges and frame built for long-lasting quality
• Versatile style suitable for all face shapes
• Includes original Ray-Ban case and cleaning cloth
• 100% UV protection against harmful sun rays
• Classic rectangular lens shape with modern appeal

banner_details:
This banner features a modern and premium layout, divided vertically into two visually distinct halves. The left segment contains all textual and call-to-action content, while the right showcases the product image. A sleek dark gradient background transitions smoothly from rich black to deep brown tones, subtly textured with low-opacity decorative circles and geometrical line patterns for visual depth.

The heading (id: **heading**) is bold and striking in white, paired with a refined subheading (id: **tagline**) in gold for brand emphasis. Key product features (id: **description**) are presented as bullet points, followed by original and discounted pricing (id: **original_price**, **price**). A small promo note (id: **discount_text**) reinforces urgency. The call-to-action is a prominent gold rectangle button (id: **cta_button**) with black text (id: **cta**). A lifestyle product image (id: **product_image**) occupies the right half, enhancing visual appeal.

**Color Palette**:
- Jet Black (#000000)
- Charcoal Gray (#1A1A1A)
- Metallic Gold (#D4AF37)
- Pure White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases sleek black Ray-Ban sunglasses with a polished, glossy finish. The dominant color is jet black (#000000), used for the frame and lenses, communicating elegance and sophistication. Subtle highlights of charcoal gray (#2E2E2E) give depth and shape to the lenses, while the reflected light adds dimension. The white logo lettering (#FFFFFF) stands out sharply against the dark frame, drawing attention to the brand. The silver accents near the hinges (#C0C0C0) offer a minimalist contrast, adding a touch of refinement. For an advertisement banner, a palette of #000000, #2E2E2E, #FFFFFF, and #C0C0C0 would reinforce the product's premium and stylish appeal.
